languages.text: "Ты тоже... не пропади там. Иди на свет. Всегда — на свет".

traits.locale_text: "Ты тоже... не пропади там. Иди на свет. Всегда — на свет".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."
languages.original_text: "Ты тоже... не пропади там. Иди на свет. Всегда — на свет".

traits.locale_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ…中では気をつけることね。光に向かって歩いて。必ず光に向かうのよ」
languages.original_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ…中では気をつけることね。光に向かって歩いて。必ず光に向かうのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “是啊……你在里面也要多保重。走向光明吧，永远走向光明。”
languages.original_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."

traits.locale_text: “是啊……你在里面也要多保重。走向光明吧，永远走向光明。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Mouais... Je vous retourne le compliment. Suivez la lumière. Ne vous en détournez pas un seul instant. »
languages.original_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."

traits.locale_text: « Mouais... Je vous retourne le compliment. Suivez la lumière. Ne vous en détournez pas un seul instant. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Sí... Cuídese también. Vaya hacia la luz. Siempre hacia la luz».
languages.original_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."

traits.locale_text: «Sí... Cuídese también. Vaya hacia la luz. Siempre hacia la luz».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ja ... Und Ihr passt da drinnen auch auf Euch auf. Geht zum Licht. Immer zum Licht."
languages.original_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."

traits.locale_text: "Ja ... Und Ihr passt da drinnen auch auf Euch auf. Geht zum Licht. Immer zum Licht."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Peki... Sen de içerideyken kendine dikkat et. Işığa doğru yürü. Her daim ışığa doğru..."
languages.original_text: "Yeah... You take care of yourself in there too. Walk toward the light. Always toward the light."

traits.locale_text: "Peki... Sen de içerideyken kendine dikkat et. Işığa doğru yürü. Her daim ışığa doğru..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
